data.title: DISH Top 120 Package
data.meta_description: The DISH Top 120 package is filled with 190 channels of news, sports, movies and more! Call 1-833-682-2047 to get America's Top 120 from DISH Network.
data.text:
DISH Top 120 Channel Package

Wireless|Customer Support

Switch to DISH & Get Up to a $300 Gift Card!*

*Call for full offer details

DISH Top 120

$8499/mo for 24 mos

$114.99/mo

190 Channels

Click to see all channels

FREE Installation As Soon As Tomorrow!

Scheduling may vary & up to 6 TV’s

Includes Smart HD DVR

Watch and record your favorite shows in HD

FREE HD for Life

Watch TV in the highest quality

Reviews:4.5/5

Click to see all reviews for America’s Top 120

190 Channels Included

See All Included Channels

Local Channels Included

FREE Premium Channels*

See All Premium Channels

Premium Channels Free for 3 Months

*All offers require credit qualification and 24-month commitment and early termination fee with eAutopay. Offer ends 9/04/24. Call for details. Prices include Hopper Duo for qualifying customers. Hopper, Hopper w/Sling or Hopper 3 $5/mo. more. Upfront fees may apply based on credit qualification. After 3 mos., you will be billed $30/mo. for Paramount+ with SHOWTIME, STARZ, and DISH Movie Pack unless you call or go online to cancel.

Make the switch today! Upgrade to DISH & Get Up to $300 in Gift Cards!**for qualifying customers 1-833-682-2047Order Online

DISH Customers Get These Benefits and More

The Best Channels & the Smartest DVR

Save with the 2-Year TV Price Guarantee

Watch TV Everywhere with DISH Anywhere

Record Up to 16 Channels Simultaneously

Get Up to a $300 Gift Card!*

Order DISH TV today and enjoy free next-day installation, the ability to skip commercials on select primetime shows, a FREE DISH Voice Remote, up to $300 in gift cards, and more!

Bundle DISH + Hughesnet

Now, for a limited time save $120/year when you bundle DISH TV and Hughesnet satellite internet.*Your savings are locked in for life as long as both subscriptions remain active.

Pick Your Bonus Pack

Mention offer code "PYP12" when you sign up for a new DISH TV package, you’ll receive one year of sports, family favorites, or outdoor entertainment on us – up to a $156 value!**

*Restrictions apply. Call for full offer details.*$10 savings represents $5/month off the DISH TV service and $5/month off the Hughesnet service. Savings apply as long as qualifying DISH and Hughesnet services remain active and in good standing. Limited-time offer. Other terms may apply. **New and qualifying former customers will receive selected package at no charge for the first 12 months. After 12 months, you will stop receiving the selected package unless you subscribe to the package. Prices, packages, programming and offers subject to change without notice. Multi-Sport Package requires subscription to America's Top 120 Plus or higher. This offer cannot be combined with any other offer. Other restrictions may apply.

DISH Top 120 Package Highlights

2-Year TV Price Guarantee

All-time favorites, including USA, CMT, E!, Disney Channel, and more

ESPN and Local Channels included

Free premium channels for 3 months

Over 28,000 free On Demand titles

Over 70 Sirius XM Music Channels

Free standard professional installation available as soon as tomorrow

DISH America’s Top 120

America’s Top 120 includes 190 TV channels and a Hopper HD DVR for just $84.99/mo.* With a DISH TV lineup that includes your local channels, blockbuster movies, radio, and popular channels like ESPN, MTV, Comedy Central, AMC, TNT, USA and more, it’s no wonder America’s Top 120 is one of the most popular DISH TV packages! Get more entertainment for less with America’s Top 120, only from DISH.

*All offers require credit qualification, 3-year commitment with early termination fee and eAutoPay.

Stay Connected with High Speed Internet

Keep your home connected in every way by adding internet starting at just $19.99 per month* to your America’s Top 120 package! Planet DISH’s trusted partners offer great internet options no matter where you live, your lifestyle or your budget. Our partnerships with leading internet providers give you options, including DSL, cable and fiber.

*Restrictions apply. Subject to availability. Internet not provided by DISH and will be billed separately.

One Price for Your TV That Won’t Go Up

Get great TV at a great price that’s guaranteed for 2 years! A subscription to DISH gives you the 2-Year TV Price Guarantee, ensuring that you’ll have worry-free TV service at the price you choose without any surprise increases.

DISH gives you the stellar TV service you want at a price you can always count on. With the 2-Year Price Guarantee, you can always rest easy with DISH!

Your Favorite Channels for Less

Balance budget and entertainment with America’s Top 120 from DISH. This package includes the popular channels your family loves and won’t break the bank! Watch Nashville on CMT, Gold Rush on Discovery and Food Paradise on Travel Channel. The kids will love Disney Channel, Freeform and Nickelodeon. Plus, cheer on your favorite teams on 5 channels from ESPN.

Watch TV Anywhere You Go

With the DISH Anywhere App, you can instantly watch sports, movies, and TV shows on your computer or mobile device from anywhere. Whether you’re on the go, flying for travel or vacation, or passing time on a lunch break, you can stream DISH – all included in your DISH Americas Top 120 package.

Enjoy DISH’s Best Deals

Your America’s Top 120 package includes tons of DISH deals that are filled with value. For a limited time, get free standard installation, a free DISH Voice Remote, free HD for life, and 4k programming! You can also subscribe to commercial-free premium channels at no extra cost for 3 months* with the America’s Top 120 package.

*4K TV required. After 3 mos., you will be billed $30/mo. for Paramount+ with SHOWTIME, STARZ, and DISH Movie Pack unless you call or go online to cancel.

Save More With Limited Time DISH Network Deals

Exclusive DISH offer for 55 and Older

DISH is offering exclusive discounts for customers aged 55 and over. These benefits include a free movie rental every month, free in-home visits from our technicians with a DISH Protect Gold plan, 6 free months of DISH Protect Plus and a DISH Voice Remote at no charge!

First on-demand movie rental free each month - choose from over 80,000 titles.

Free in-home service visits from expert techs along with no-cost equipment replacements.

DISH Protect Plus free for 6 months - a $59 value.

DISH Network Military Offer

If you’re active duty or a military veteran, get these special offers from DISH. You can get the Stars & Stripes add-on pack at no charge (including networks like STARZ Encore Westerns and American Heroes Channel), and get a free on-demand movie rental each month!

Stars & Stripes channel pack for free

Free Hopper upgrade so you can stream your TV from anywhere

Your first monthly movie rental is covered by DISH

DISH Network Healthcare Offer

We at DISH offer special offers to our essential and hardworking health care workers. With DISH you can get the Heartland channel pack at no charge (Hallmark Channel, UpTV, OWN) as well as a free on-demand movie rental every month!

Get 12 family-friendly channels included for free with the Heartland Pack

Enjoy movie night on DISH with your first monthly movie rental for free

DISH Network Teacher Offer

At DISH, we know our teachers deserve a little something extra. With our new Teachers Offer, education professionals will enjoy America’s best value, service, and technology.

With the teacher offer, your first movie rental, every month is on us! Choose from over 20,000 of the most popular titles.

The Heartland Channel pack is included for free! You’ll love this collection of 12 family-friendly channels – a $144 value over 2 years!

DISH Top 120 Frequently Asked Questions

What Channels are on AT 120?

DISH America’s Top 120 includes 190 popular channels, including AMC, Comedy Central, CNN, Discovery, ESPN, FS1, History, MTV, NBCSN, TBS, TLC and VH1. There are also music channels from DISH and SiriusXM, and your local channels are included.

Learn More…

How Much is DISH’s Basic Package?

All your favorite basic channel packages are included in the America’s Top 120 package from DISH. This basic TV package is $84.99 per month with a 2-Year Price Guarantee. Local channels, HD for life, 4K programming and a Hopper Smart HD DVR are all included.

Learn More…

Exceptional Customer Experience
